statements: UPDATE satellite_imagery_data SET image_data = 'New Image Data' WHERE satellite_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE satellite_imagery_data SET location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(10 20)') WHERE satellite_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE satellite_imagery_data SET capture_date = '2022-01-20' WHERE satellite_id = '8a2626f3-2fa4-4f05-91f5-7e46287b2c0b';
UPDATE satellite_imagery_data SET location = ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(10, 20), 4326), image_data = E'\x00FF00FF' WHERE satellite_id = '8a2626f3-2fa4-4f05-91f5-7e46287b2c0b';
UPDATE satellite_images SET image_url = 'http://example.com/image1.jpg' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE image_metadata SET satellite_name = 'Satellite-A', acquisition_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE satellite_images SET image_url = 'http://example.com/image1.jpg', image_timestamp = '2021-10-15 10:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE image_metadata SET satellite_id = 2, satellite_name = 'Satellite X', acquisition_date = '2021-10-20' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE satellite_images SET image_name = 'Updated Image Name' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE satellite_metadata SET metadata_value = 'Updated Metadata Value' WHERE metadata_id = 2;
UPDATE satellite_images SET image_name = 'New Image Name', image_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE satellite_metadata SET metadata_value = 'new value' WHERE metadata_key = 'location' AND image_id = 2;
UPDATE satellite_images SET image_size = 2048 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE image_metadata SET satellite_name = 'Satellite XYZ' WHERE image_id = 2;
UPDATE satellite_images SET image_size = 1024 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE image_metadata SET satellite_name = 'SatelliteXYZ', resolution = 'High' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE satellite_images SET image_name = 'new_image_name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE satellites SET last_contacted = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE satellite_id = 2;
UPDATE satellite_images SET capture_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE satellites SET launch_date = '2023-05-30', last_contacted = '2023-06-01' WHERE satellite_id = 2;
